Package math.core

package math.core
The math.core package provides classes for arbitrary-precision arithmetic, number formatting, and basic mathematical operations.

Key Features:

  • Arbitrary-precision number representation and basic arithmetic operations (Digit)
  • Custom number formatting and validation (Notationer)
  • Core arithmetic algorithms (Operationer)
Since:
0.0.1
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    math.core.exceptions
    Provides custom exception classes for mathematical operations and number processing.
    math.core.interfaces
    Provides core interfaces for mathematical operations.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Digit
    Turns any primitive given number or a real number as string into a full notationed readable number.

    Represents arbitrary-precision decimal numbers with configurable notation formatting.
    Notationer
    Manages the format and convertion between differents numeric notations.
    Operationer
    Manages the operations and results of the four basic mathemathic operations.
